quest.name: Redolent Refuse
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Tio-Reeq is wrinkling his nose in displeasure.
objectives: Pick bunches of Kholusian sage near the Clave.
Deliver the bunches of Kholusian sage to Tio-Reeq.
Use the sachet of Kholusian sage at the designated location.

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: Ugh... Oh, my poor, sensitive nose! Do you not smell that awful stench!?

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: What we require here is a strategically placed sachet of ground Kholusian sage. The trouble is, I'm not quite willing to die in the process of obtaining said herb.

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: But what of you, misssir? There is sage aplenty near the Clave should the promise of reward overshadow any fear you might have of stabbing tooth and rending claw. Two generous bunches should suffice!

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: You'll find patches of sage over to the west, near the Clave. Two large handfuls of the herb would be most appreciated!

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: Yes, this is a goodly amount. My thanks! A moment while I prepare an experimental sachet...

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: I'll just grind these up...add a sprinkle of this...a dash of that...

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: <sniff> Ah, 'tis akin to inhaling a springtime breeze! I must begin producing these fair-scented pouches in bulk!

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: You, misssir, have the privilege of putting my aromatic creation to the test. Place one of my sachets behind this foul-smelling shack, and inform me of the results!

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: A proper test of my sachets is in order! And the backside of this malodorous lean-to should provide the perfect testing ground!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The rank fumes permeating the air are slowly replaced by a pleasant, refreshing scent...

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: Did my sachet prove the victor in that contest of fragrances?

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: Well, that is satisfying to hear! I shall continue manufacturing these pockets of sage and proceed with secreting them about the place.

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: The thing of it is, the folk of Gatetown often paw through the refuse discarded by the free citizens of Eulmore.

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: Such salvaged items have, however, spent no short span of time moldering amongst actual garbage... Thus the offensive odor I have been forced to endure. But no longer!

dialogue.name: TIOREEQ
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, my olfactory senses will be spared. Pray accept this token for your trouble!
